auth.loginToContinue: Log in to your account to continue
auth.acceptTerms: I accept the Terms and Conditions
auth.checkEmail: Please check your inbox to verify your email before logging in.

onboarding.welcomeDescription: Your all-in-one solution for managing your travel services and documents.
onboarding.manageDocumentsDescription: Upload, organize, and track all your important documents in one place.
onboarding.stayConnectedDescription: Chat with our team and get real-time updates on your cases.
onboarding.getStartedDescription: Ready to begin? Let's get you set up and start managing your services.

home.title: Home
home.noRecentApprovalsDescription: You will be notified when a case is approved.
home.pendingActionDescription: Latest update on {{date}}. Please review the case details.
home.noPendingActionsDescription: Great job! You are all caught up.
home.noCaseForPayment: No case is ready for payment yet.

cases.title: My Cases
cases.chatUnavailableMessage: Chat will be available once your advisor reviews this case.
cases.chatAwaitingAgentMessage: An advisor will contact you shortly. Chat becomes available after the assignment.

newCase.title: Submit New Case
newCase.heroSubtitle: Tell us what you need help with and how soon you need it.
newCase.serviceTypeHelper: Select the immigration service that best fits your situation.
newCase.priorityHelper: Let us know how urgent this request is so we can support you accordingly.
newCase.fillAllFields: Please fill in all required fields
newCase.caseFailed: Failed to create case. Please try again.

student_visa.title: Student Visa
student_visa.description: Support for academic admissions, study permits, and university transitions.

work_permit.title: Work Permit
work_permit.description: Employment-based applications including renewals and employer sponsorship.

family_reunification.title: Family Reunification
family_reunification.description: Guidance for reunifying with loved ones through spousal or dependent visas.

tourist_visa.title: Tourist Visa
tourist_visa.description: Short-term travel visas for vacations, events, and short-stay visits.

business_visa.title: Business Visa
business_visa.description: Corporate travel, conferences, and investment-related immigration needs.

permanent_residency.title: Permanent Residency
permanent_residency.description: Long-term residency planning, eligibility assessments, and documentation.

normal.title: Normal
normal.description: Standard processing speed is fine for me.

urgent.title: Urgent
urgent.description: Critical deadline — I need immediate assistance.

documents.title: Documents
documents.casesLoadError: Unable to load cases. Please try again.
documents.createCaseFirst: Create a case to upload documents.
documents.downloadOpenErrorMessage: This file cannot be opened on your device.
documents.noCaseMessage: Create a case before uploading documents.

uploadDocument.title: Upload Document
uploadDocument.chooseCaseDescription: Assign this upload to one of your active cases and pick the document type before continuing.
uploadDocument.helperText: Supported formats: PDF, DOC, DOCX, JPG, PNG (Max 10MB)

empty.title: No Payments Yet
empty.description: Your payment history will appear here

sheet.title: Choose a Case
sheet.subtitle: Select a pending or in-progress case to continue.
sheet.secondaryInfo: Tap to review and pay this case in full.

empty.title: All caught up!
empty.subtitle: You have no outstanding cases that require payment.

chat.title: Chat
chat.unavailableMessage: You need an active session to continue the conversation.
chat.caseNotFound: We could not locate this case. Please try again later.
chat.pendingReview: Your advisor will reach out once the case is under review.
chat.noAgentMessage: An advisor will contact you shortly. Chat becomes available after the assignment.
chat.awaitAgentInitiation: Your advisor will open the conversation soon. You can reply once it is available.
chat.genericError: We were unable to open this conversation. Please try again later.

profile.title: Profile & Settings
profile.editProfileSubtitle: Update your personal details so we can stay in touch.
profile.personalInfoSubtitle: Everything we know about you in one place.
profile.changePasswordSubtitle: Use a strong password that you have not used elsewhere.
profile.noChanges: No changes to save. Update a field first.
profile.name: Name
profile.phonePlaceholder: Add a phone number for quick contact
profile.syncNotice: Your updates sync instantly across all your devices.
profile.securityCopy: We use industry-leading encryption to protect your personal information.
profile.passwordHint: Passwords must be at least 8 characters and include a combination of numbers and letters.

errors.generic: Something went wrong. Please try again.
errors.network: Network error. Please check your connection.
errors.unauthorized: You are not authorized to perform this action.
errors.serverError: Server error. Please try again later.

validation.passwordTooShort: Password must be at least 8 characters
validation.acceptTerms: You must accept Terms and Privacy Policy
